Class MavenExecutionResultAssert

java.lang.Object
org.assertj.core.api.AbstractAssert<MavenExecutionResultAssert,MavenExecutionResult>

  • Method Details

    • assertThat

      public static MavenExecutionResultAssert assertThat(MavenExecutionResult actual)
      An entry point for MavenExecutionResultAssert to follow AssertJ standard assertThat() statements.
      With a static import, one's can write directly : assertThat(result).isSuccessful();
      Parameters:
      actual - the MavenExecutionResult we want to make assertions on.
      Returns:
      a new MavenExecutionResultAssert

    • out

      Returns:

    • project

      This will give you access to the project directory of the project which is under test.
      Returns:
      The project result.

    • cache

      public MavenCacheResultAssert cache()
      This will give you access to the maven cache directory of the project.
      Returns:
      The cache result
